text: reuxngraw khxng brrda phu thima kxn hna phwk cea chen klum chn khxng nuhˌ xad læa sʹamud læa brrda phu thima hlangcak phwk khea midi ma thung phwk cea dxk hrux mimi phu dı ru reuxng khxng phwk khea nxk ca kxallxhˌ brrda rx sul khxng phwk khea di mayang phwk khea phrxm dwy hlakthan xan chad cæng phwk khea di xea mux pidpak khxng phwk khea xeng læa klaw wa thæcring rea di ptiseth sraththa nı sing thi phwk than thuk sng ma (khux xalkurxan) læa thæcring phwk rea xyu nı kar sngsay xyang nænxn tx sing thi phwk than reiyk rxng rea
